statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Florida Int'l tops Wright State 61-59 in OT
article.headline: Florida Int'l tops Wright State 61-59 in OT
article.linkText: Florida Int'l tops Wright State 61-59 in OT
article.story: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- Dennis Mavin had 24 points -- including a layup with 3 seconds left in regulation to force overtime -- and Florida International topped Wright State 61-59 in OT in the Spartanburg Marriott Upstate Classic on Friday. Mavin had a pair of free throws and FIU was 7 of 8 from the line in OT. Trailing by nine at intermission, Wright State (3-3) scored the first seven points of the second half, including Chrishawn Hopkins' 3-pointer, and it was tip-and-tuck the rest of the way, though the Raiders didn't have a lead until 5:46 on another Hopkins trey. Florida International (4-2) used a 13-2 run midway through the first half to turn a 4-point game into a 31-22 lead at intermission as both teams struggled to get their offense going. JT Yoho led Wright State with 16 points and 9 boards. Hopkins finished with 13 and Joe Thomasson added 11.
